page.title: 20A SURVEY OF CRADLEY CHILDREN
page.content: 90 Children were surveyed in Cradley School.67 families were represented.3.3% are only children.91% live in houses.8.8% live in bungalows.100% have gardens.78.8% grow fruit and or vegetables.5.5% have grandparents living with them.87.7% have pets,the most popular being cats and dogs.64.4% belong to clubs,the most popular being swimming, Brownies and Cubs.100% of families own cars and 68.8% own 2 or more.35% parents work at or near home.47.7% say they vist Malvern more frequently than any other town.47.7% never go to church or Sunday school.24.4% attend regularly. 63.3% come to school by car.25.5% walk. The most popular food is chips. 46.6% have a computer at home. 53.3% borrow books from a town library 85.5% like living in Cradley.
